NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Allows app to access location always to track order with drivers with real time location
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allows app to access location when in use to track order with drivers
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Allows app to access location always to track order with drivers with real time location
NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow the app to use the camera to take pictures and share them with users
NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow the app to use the photo library to share with users or save them
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow the app to use the photo library to share with users
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow the app to use the microphone to capture video to share with users
